content: Thank you so much. Thank you.

Good noises.

Thank you.

Welcome! And in
this incredible show...
Richard reads a map...
James wears a hat...
And I remember how old I am.
Brilliant stuff.

A brilliant show.
A good one.
Now, that smorgasbord

firmly on the ground.

You see, us three agree on,

No, it got quite heated.
It did get very heated indeed.

No, we didn't.

This was
